feed.subtitle: An infosec guy who's constantly seeking for knowledge. CyberSecurity, Offensive Security, Hacking, Pentesting

entry.title: Advent of Cyber 2 [2020]
entry.summary: Day 0 After last year's shenanigans where Elf McElferson and Elf McSkidy were on damage control mode the entirety of December, McSkidy vowed to never let that happen again. The previous Christmas period was extremely stressful with the Christmas Monster managing to compromise every system within Santa's corporate infrastructure to prevent Christmas from happening. Is Christmas still in danger ...

entry.title: Welcome On My Blog
entry.summary: Hi everyone! This is my offensive security journey blog. On here you can find information about my current research interests and projects about #offsec I decide to embark on. I will be blogging regularly about material that I’m currently learning, CTF challenges I’m completing and different research areas I delve into! Improvements, comments and constructive criticisms are welcome, so feel f...
